resources:
RoseBotTablet'
If you go here you find fantasy books. If you go here you find sci-fi books. The red marker on the map shows your location in the store. If you go here you will find science books. Hi, my name is Rose Bot. You can ask me where the different book categories are or press the ready button. What books are you looking for? It was a great pleasure to help. Now I am going back to sleep. Sorry I didn\'t understand, can you ask again? Sorry, I don\'t understand you. You can also press the ready button, or click on me and try asking again. Thanks for asking. I am fine. How are you? Great to hear you are fine. How can I help you? Here you can select the category of fiction you are looking for. Here you can select the non-fiction category you are looking for. If you go here you find poetry If you go here you find crime and suspense books.
Ask me what you want to know by clicking on me or select a ready button. Bookstore Language You are here
